title: Hedge Fund Shiprock Snags Converium’s Cura in Latest EM Hire
description: Shiprock Capital Management hired Nadir Cura as the London-based hedge fund builds up its roster of emerging-market specialists, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: Shiprock Capital Management hired Nadir Cura as the London-based hedge fund builds up its roster of emerging-market specialists, according to people familiar with the matter.
